Name: World Walker
Description: Reduces Stamina cost when sprinting and evading.

Name: Keeper's Blessing
Description: Increases resistance to elemental damage, buildup, and STATUS effects.

Name: Teamwork
Description: Increases Mod Power buildup rate, earned Experience when killing enemies, and reduces damage taken when standing near teammates.

Name: Elder Knowledge
Description: Increases earned Experience when killing enemies.

Name: Scavenger
Description: Increases the amount of scrap picked up.

Name: Recovery
Description: Increases Stamina Regen rate and reduces Stamina Regen delay.

Name: Catalyst
Description: Increases chance to proc STATUS effects on enemies.

Name: Arcane Strike
Description: Increases Mod Power gained on Melee hits.

Name: Cold as Ice
Description: Increases damage dealt to enemies when attacking them from behind.

Name: Fortification
Description: Reduces damage taken while reviving teamates.
